summary: Project to build an application including an admin dashboard.

existing_features.title: Ensure an Admin Dashboard is available at the route "/admin" and is protected so that only authenticated admin users can access it; non-admin or unauthenticated users must see an access-denied experience.

On the Admin Dashboard page, display high-level statistics and navigation tiles/cards for key admin areas (Products, Categories, Menu, Orders, and Settings such as Google Reviews), with each tile linking to its respective admin page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an admin dashboard to the application
Add an Admin entry point in the site navigation that is only visible to authenticated admin users and routes to "/admin".
